items.title: EE1C01 - Electronics Engineering Bootcamp
items.headline: Hands-on learning by building, A course for electrical engineering, embedded systems engineering students and hobbyists
objectives_summary: Understand the core concepts of electronic theory (voltage, current, resistance, energy, power in a circuit)
Read and draw electronic schematics.
Build practical circuits on a breadboard.

items.title: Hands-On STM32: Basic Peripherals with HAL
items.headline: Becoming an expert in STM32 HAL programming. Practice on STM32 basic peripherals using STM32CubeMX.
objectives_summary: Program microcontrollers using a high level abstraction library
Develop embedded software using Keil uVision 5
Write codes for basic peripherals like Clock Control, GPIO, Interrupt, and DMA

items.title: 3 in 1 IoT Bundle : Arduino Uno, ESP8266 and Raspberry Pi
items.headline: Learn and Understand the Inner working of Most Popular Devices and Hardware for Making IoT Usecases Come to Life
objectives_summary: Able to connect and create IoT Usecases circuits with Micro Devices
Able to Understand How to Work with Arduino, Raspberry Pi and ESP8266 in Details
Create Own IoT Apps and Usecases

items.title: FPGA Design with MATLAB & Simulink
items.headline: FPGA Design approach with System Generator of MATLAB/Simulink & HDL Coder, Course introduced the Complete Design Flow
objectives_summary: FPGA Development with Matlab and Simulink Tool.
Creating Projects with System Generator and HDL coder
Implementing FIR and IIR Filter on FPGA from System Generator

items.title: Hands on projects with the I2C protocol - Learn by doing!
items.headline: Gain a deep understanding of the I2C and GPIO peripherals with hands on embedded systems projects using STM32
objectives_summary: Be able to set up I2C communication between microcontrollers and thousands of I2C devices available in the market
Understand how OLED displays work and know how to display content on them
Gain a deep understanding of how to set up I2C communication between a STM32 Nucleo microcontroller and a Linear Technologies LTC2990 Current, Voltage and Temperature sensor

items.title: Arduino meets LabVIEW - Wiring, Installation & Programming
items.headline: Virtualise your Arduino on PC Screen using LabVIEW
objectives_summary: To Design Arduino Circuit in Fritzing
To Learn Arduino Programming & Interfacing
To Program Arduino using C Language

items.title: ESP8266 for absolute beginner - Arduino alternative 2021
items.headline: Build IoT web application, LCD pattern, Physical Input, GPIO Interfacing, firmware Installation, ESP12E, NodeMCU & more
objectives_summary: Build your own IoT dashboard and control any home appliances remotely
Get to know the principle of LCD and generate animated pattern of your choice
Understand the fundamentals of LUA programming and powerful C++ language

items.title: The Complete Raspberry Pi Bootcamp

visible_instructors.title: Educational Engineering Team
visible_instructors.job_title: Team of skilled Engineers Sharing Knowledge with the World
visible_instructors.name: Educational Engineering

items.headline: The only course you need to learn to Program and become Raspberry Pi developer. Basics, intermediate and Advance Topics
objectives_summary: Setup the Raspbian operating system to the RPi
Wire up your Raspberry Pi to create a fully functional computer
Use and Learn Python programming language

items.title: Learn SCADA from Scratch to Hero ( Indusoft & TIA portal )
items.headline: This course is a great push for any one who want to start in SCADA systems design career
objectives_summary: Monitor and Control PLC operations
Link it to the PLC and create tags
design scada systems as professionals

items.title: Master your laptop hardware
items.headline: Basic electronics|Chip level Repair|computer repair||board repair|laptop repair|electronic schematic| boardview
objectives_summary: The basic principles of electronics applied to laptop board
Reading electronic schematic
Using boardview to find electrical components easily

items.title: 3D printer programming using G-Code

visible_instructors.title: Marc Cronin
visible_instructors.job_title: Senior Aerospace CNC Machine Tools Programming Engineer
visible_instructors.name: Marc

items.headline: Learn the programming language that 3D printers read - solve issues, split and join G Code files and much more!
objectives_summary: Have a full understanding of the G-Code language that 3D printers read
Split and Join programs so parts can be printed at separate times
Problem shoot issues at the program level

items.title: RSLogix/Studio 5000 Training using Function Block Diagrams.

visible_instructors.title: Jeff Sharman
visible_instructors.job_title: Instrumentation, PLC, HMI and Networking Specialist.
visible_instructors.name: Jeff

items.headline: This is RSlogix 5000 Training at a Higher level using Function Block Diagrams.
objectives_summary: After this course, you will be able to Create Function Block Diagrams using Logical instructions, Analog instructions and PID control.
You can create logic functionality in ladder. Now learn how to do this in FBD's.
Learn how to use analog functions in FBD's. Much easier than ladder.

items.title: How to Build a Computer from Scratch: The Complete Course
items.headline: The Complete Computer Build Guide: Discover how to choose the correct parts, assemble them, and install windows.
objectives_summary: Understand the components that go into a PC .
Know what type of user you are.
Develop effective methods for choosing parts

items.title: STM32F4 Programming Course for Beginners
items.headline: Learn how to design electronic projects with the STM32F4 Discovery Board.
objectives_summary: Understand basic principles in electronics design
Understand the principles of ARM programming
Learn how STM32 works

items.title: Mastering Cypress PSoC-An Embedded System Design perspective
items.headline: Design Hardware, Develop Firmware & Integrate both to see the reflection of your idea.
objectives_summary: Build applications on unconventional processing element PSoC
Work comfortably on PSoC creator
Develop firmware for embedded processors

items.title: Writing SystemVerilog Testbenches for Newbie
items.headline: Step by Step Guide to SystemVerilog
objectives_summary: From Zero to Hero in writing SystemVerilog Testbenches
Practical approach for learning SystemVerilog Components
Inheritance, Polymorphism, Randomization in SystemVerilog
